Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Structural change in the protein domain
Readout description.Result Description: The Parkin Ubld mutant K48D showed complete urea unfolding.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Structural change in the protein domain
Readout description.Result Description: The Parkin Ubld mutant R42H showed partial urea unfolding.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin Ubld protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Parkin Ubld with no mutations (WT) was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 90% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: GB1-Ubliquin Ublidin Fused to Parkin Study

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Structural change in the protein domain
Readout description.Result Description: The Parkin Ubld mutant K48D showed reduced protein expression.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Structural change in the protein domain
Readout description.Result Description: The Parkin Ubld mutant R42H showed no change in protein expression.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin Ubld protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Parkin Ubld with no mutations (WT) was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
